column1:
Please contact using the floating bottom contact footer to let me know what you think this page concludes with Pokémon through the following listed below, thanks.:)
• This Pokémon's level of popularity due to any good reasons like their artwork design and species strength in competitive play.
• Any interest strategies in competitive play that you like using for them.
• How you think this Pokémon would interact with my world.
• What changes to this Pokémon you want to be made.
• Whether or not you think that this Pokémon needs to be written out of the Pokémon main franchise due to any good reasons.
